data.title: Unique Arts and Crafts Gallery located in Downtown Montgomery
data.text:
SAC's Gallery is an intimate gallery located in old downtown Montgomery with a nice selection of local artist works.
The gallery offers occasional classes and workshops for a minimal fee. The docents are some of the local artists displaying works so they are informed and friendly.
I encourage visitors to come and view the local artisans work.

data.title: The place to See Local Art and Fine Crafts!
data.text: I have been associated with this Not for profit Gallery since 1998. They really work hard to present the work of local artists in a way to showcase and promote the regions art. I am really impressed with the wide variety of work and the affordable price range. All workers are volunteers, most have work in the Gallery, and are enthusiastic about their art. They also have events to feature artists where the public can meet artists and socialize. I have taken classes here. Very affordable, lots of fun. Great information. Come here first if you are looking for artwork for your office, home, or a gift for a friend. I always do.
